title: Creative Music Creation Education Program Utilizing Mobile Devices

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Blended education program designed to enhance music creation competencies using digital tools, combining online platforms with offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners can complete basic music tracks using mobile music production apps (e.g., GarageBand).
Learners can revise their work by reflecting on peer feedback through a collaborative creative process in digital environments.
Learners can upload their creative outputs to online knowledge-sharing platforms and conduct peer evaluations.

resources: GarageBand or Similar Music Production Apps

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
